mapper.select: SELECT t_group_order.id, t_group_order.order_code, t_group_order.department_id, t_group_order.group_unit_id, t_group_order.physical_type, t_group_order.sales_director, t_group_order.sales_director_name, t_group_order.signing_time, t_group_order.delivery_time, t_group_order.remark, t_group_order.sales_participant, t_group_order.sales_participant_name, t_group_order.del_flag, t_group_order.create_id, t_group_order.create_time, t_group_order.update_id, t_group_order.update_time, t_group_order.delete_id, t_group_order.delete_time, t_group_order.state, t_group_order.audit_state, t_group_order. pay_status, t_group_order.package_price, t_group_order.package_total, t_group_order.package_discount, t_group_order.person_count, t_group_order.order_price, t_group_order.order_total, t_group_order.order_discount, t_group_order.sporadic_physical, t_group_order.order_path, t_group_unit.name AS group_unit_name FROM t_group_order LEFT JOIN t_group_unit ON t_group_order.group_unit_id = t_group_unit.id LEFT JOIN t_order_group ON t_group_order.id = t_order_group.group_order_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
SELECT t_group_order.*, t_group_unit.name AS group_unit_name FROM t_group_order LEFT JOIN t_group_unit ON t_group_order.group_unit_id = t_group_unit.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT t_group_order.*, t_group_unit.name AS unitName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t_order_group.combo_id) AS comboIds FROM t_group_order LEFT JOIN t_group_unit ON t_group_order.group_unit_id = t_group_unit.id LEFT JOIN t_order_group ON t_order_group.group_order_id = t_group_order.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
SELECT * FROM t_group_order WHERE DAY(create_time) = DAY(NOW()) AND department_id = #{departmentId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1

select SUM(CASE WHEN audit_state = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as waitApprove ,SUM(CASE WHEN audit_state = '2' or audit_state = '3' or audit_state = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as approved from t_group_order where physical_type = #{physicalType} and del_flag = 0

select SUM(CASE WHEN audit_state = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as waitApprove ,SUM(CASE WHEN audit_state = '3' or audit_state = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as approved from t_group_order where physical_type = #{physicalType} and del_flag = 0

select SUM(CASE WHEN audit_state = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as waitApprove ,SUM(CASE WHEN audit_state = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as approved from t_group_order where physical_type = #{physicalType} and del_flag = 0
select g.*,u.* from t_group_order g LEFT JOIN t_group_unit u on g.group_unit_id = u.id WHERE g.del_flag = 0 and g.id = #{id};
SELECT `name`,id FROM t_combo WHERE id = (SELECT combo_id from t_order_group WHERE id = #{groupId})
